name: linkace
description: LinkAce is a self-hosted bookmark archive with tags, notes, link checking, and archive.org integration. It allows saving and organizing web links privately or publicly and supports API and imports.
features: Bookmark Archive: Save links, Tags and notes, Archive.org integration. Preserve web content permanently.
Link Checking: Automatic validation, Broken link detection, Status monitoring. Keep bookmarks healthy.
Organization: Tags and lists, Search functionality, Import/export. Organize bookmarks your way.
API Access: RESTful API, Browser extensions, Automation support. Integrate with your workflow.
